title: Essembie's friday night community matches - adc only

embed.description: Been a while since i hosted one of these. Doing a community match this Friday night 830 sydney time. Adc only teams. Build them how you like! Will update this with game names etc Let me know if you're keen!

body:
Tonight @830 I'll be hosting an adc only match. 

Will share the game name on here and also in the gd chat.

Game will kick off at 830 so jump in 5 mins before.

2 rules
1. Don't be a dick
2. Don't surrender 

Let me know if you are keen.

replies.body: Game name will be _**Essembie's ADC Only match**_
Ap sivir - cam that be a thing?

> [{quoted}](name=Essembie,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=GfGHnnpw,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-09-24T20:43:11.414+0000)

i'll be there, how do i join?
I'll post the game name on this post at about 825
